Ergo Sum - Short Film (2018)


Directed, Edited, Written, Scored, and Produced



A short film about the examination of one's consciousness.


Film Type: Experimental, Short
Genres: Experimental, Drama
Runtime: 8 minutes 5 seconds
Completion Date: May 10, 2018
Country of Origin: Italy
Country of Filming: Ireland, Italy
Shooting Format: DSLR
Aspect Ratio: 16:9
Film Color: Black & White and Color
First-time Filmmaker: No
Student Project: Yes


Film Festival Selections


Officially selected for Indie Cork Film Festival
Officially selected for Story International Film Festival
Officially selected for Passaggi D'autore


Temps Perdu - Short Poem Film (2018)


Directed, Edited, Written, and Produced



Temps Perdu is an experimental video that examines Proust’s philosophical perception of time.


Film Type: Short
Genres: Experimental
Runtime: 1 minutes 59 seconds
Completion Date: January 10, 2019
Country of Origin: Italy
Country of Filming: Ireland, Italy
Shooting Format: DSLR
Aspect Ratio: 4:3
Film Color: Color
First-time Filmmaker: No
Student Project: Yes

S'Espropriu - Documentary Short Film (2020)


Directed, Edited and Produced



A short film about the degradation of the area outside an inaccessible military base in south Sardinia.


Film Type: Short
Genres: Experimental, documentary
Runtime: 14 minutes 35 seconds
Completion Date: January 29, 2020
Country of Origin: Italy
Country of Filming: Italy
Shooting Format: Digital - BMPCC 4k
Aspect Ratio: 1.9:1
Film Color: Black & White
First-time Filmmaker: No
Student Project: Yes

Gilbert's Dead - Music video(2019)


Cinematographer



Music video filmed with super 8 camera - Gilbert, or The Unfathomable Loneliness of the Deep Space Prospector - Gilbert's Dead.


Film Type: Music video
Runtime: 3 minutes 3 seconds
Completion Date: August 5, 2019
Country of Origin: Germany, Ireland
Country of Filming: Germany
Shooting Format: Kodak Super 8 Camera
Aspect Ratio: 4:3
Film Color: Kodak VISION3 200T Color Negative Film
